title: woman bouncing ball: light skin tone
category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
description: The Woman With Ball, Type-1-2 emoji is a sequence of the ? Person With Ball,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-1-2, ? Female Sign and ? Var
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman bouncing ball emoji, shown with a light skin tone, captures a moment of joyful activity and playful energy, rendered with Apple's signature vibrant colors and dynamic 3D shading. The smooth gradients and realistic lighting make the ball appear to have a satisfying bounce, while the woman's posture suggests lighthearted fun and athleticism. This emoji is perfect for conveying a sense of playfulness, exercise, or lighthearted amusement in messages, embodying a spirit of carefree movement.
